metadata.name: FUSION
metadata.description:
The "FUSION" NFT 3D-art project was exhibited at MIS - MUSEUM OF IMAGE AND SOUND in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil from May 14 until June 26 and was extended until July 10, 2022.

FUSION appears as a digital 3D metamorphosis of light, form, movement and sound.

The background image is based on a iPhone photo of the KAM work "Love Board". The photo was later modified through image manipulation. The same background was also defined as environment image for the 3D animation and reflects in each of the sphere's facets.

The sounds were generated in lower areas to harmoniously support the smooth movement of the slowly changing silvery shape.

3D Animation

60 s
